title: Explicit Instructional Design for Improving Critical Thinking and Reading Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematical concepts and basic text comprehension abilities
context.additional_context: For professionals in medical/legal/technical fields requiring enhanced critical reading skills in mathematical domains, conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze various mathematical texts and identify logical errors.
Learners develop the ability to systematically evaluate the problem-solving process of mathematical problems according to explicit instructional methods.
Based on critical thinking dispositions (openness, analytical thinking, systematic approach), learners can critically interpret complex mathematical concepts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
